name: vs Mattia
description:
History: Mattia, a 17-year-old boy, has taken a passion for rap and clashes with many opponents. Last on his list are bf and gf a strange couple without a name bf prepares for a series of rap challenges with many strange and mysterious characters he will meet more and more as he finishes his rap battle!

Credits:

Song: dansells512, nunosqr

Normal character and the furry one: mflore, patateaubeurr

Background menu: dtmcfries

Character animation: milano_arts
